channel.title: Adding ::vote command
channel.description:
Every vote tutorial or snippet I've seen has something that has to do with a MySql or something like that, but since my website doesn't have that addition(at least I don't think or am not aware of) how do I make it do a command can only be activated once every 24 hours?
Thx ;d

item.title: Adding ::vote command
item.dc:creator: @polkaman polkaman
item.description:
@polkaman wrote:

I really can’t, I’ve looked at the Pest Control timers and… :s if you could try to make something I’d be really grateful.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding ::vote command
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Add a timer. Look at some of the minigames in the source that have a timer, and just learn from it. If you cannot find out how, i could TRY to whip something up for you.

Read full topic
